TopicTitle: guys just returned, my Lock target keeps disappearing

Articles.Content:
Found and docked with space station ok, went to rescue a kerb, no target orange separation icon.?

some thing i am doing wrong.??

watching space X on you tube, the one thing that lets KSP down is the onboard camera for docking we once had, shame. the most realistic thing in the whole game.

any help with me set as target icon, i have saved game waiting to save a kerbal. lol

regards Brian
thanks well done. kerbal saved. lol
